Name: Project Beril / 贝丽尔养成计划
About the game: One day you fell into the virtual world and was asked to train an AI. This is a danmaku game, but you will not challenge the bullet-hell by yourself. Raise an AI to deal with all kinds of danmaku. On the one hand, you need to upgrade the AI by beating enemies, adjust the AI parameters, and make the AI become more powerful. On the other hand, there is danmaku that AI can't dodge. It is necessary to be familiar with the characteristics of AI and overcome the difficulties through human-machine collaboration. Note: The main stages of this game are basically played with the mouse. There is another challenge mode that can be played with the keyboard or gamepad as traditional shmups, but you can be assisted by AI. Lead the AI with mouse, and AI will dodge by herself.
